personal.name: Yusuf Umar Hanafi
personal.title: Flutter Developer | iOS Developer
personal.tagline: Crafting exceptional digital experiences with modern technologies
personal.bio: A hard-working, Detail-oriented, problem solver with creative solutions, and self-motivated Mobile Application Developer. Someone who has great ambition to change the world for the better through the lines of code that he wrote. Based on Steve Jobs Think Different principle. With more than 4 years of experience in mobile application development, I hope to make unique and different breakthroughs in solving problems through technology. Through mobile applications, I hope to become a world-class developer that is useful for life.

experience.title: Senior Flutter Developer
experience.description: Leading Flutter development for cutting-edge applications with Clean Architecture principles, BLoC state management, and CI/CD implementation through GitHub Actions.
responsibilities: Developed a cutting-edge Flutter application for Wolkk, integrating BLoC Cubit for state management, adhering to Clean Architecture principles, ensuring clean code practices, and implementing CI/CD pipelines through GitHub Actions for seamless deployment processes
Created and implemented a standardized Flutter project template with optimized initialization code and project structure for improved development efficiency and consistency across Wolkk's projects
Integrated platform channels in Flutter applications at Wolkk to seamlessly connect and synchronize native code, enhancing the overall functionality and performance of the application

Led a development team in creating a cutting-edge POS application for a high-profile German client using Flutter on the Windows desktop platform. Directed communication with product managers, product owners, and clients to ensure project alignment, while providing code reviews, developmental guidance, and maintaining project progress

Implemented a robust method channel framework in Flutter to seamlessly integrate native code written in Kotlin, C++, and Swift, enhancing the performance and functionality of Wolkk's mobile applications
achievements: Successfully contributed to aad_oauth package with adding Azure Active Directory running in Windows Platform
Successfully implemented Android keyboard behavior and custom keyboard layout with multiple language in Windows Platform
Successfully implemented multiple screen Flutter app for customer in Point-of-Sale app
Successfully created engelhorn_package_api package for Flutter to network consumer handler multiplatform apps
Successfully led Engelhorn Stationary Development team from zero

experience.title: Flutter Developer
experience.description: Contributed to innovative Flutter applications with Firebase integration, custom method channels, and performance optimization using MVVM architecture and Cubit state management.
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of the CUiT app by collaborating closely with the Flutter team at Volantis.io, implementing innovative UI/UX features that enhanced user engagement and overall app performance

Implemented Firebase Authentication, Cloud Firestore, Firebase Crashlytics, Firebase App Distribution, and Firebase Dynamic Links into Volantis.io's Flutter app, optimizing user experience and ensuring seamless functionality across all platforms
Implemented a custom Flutter method channel to efficiently integrate a camera AI 3rd party library in Kotlin and Swift, enhancing performance and user experience for CUiT

Implemented optimized performance enhancements in the Buzzco app by integrating advanced Flutter packages and applying best practices in MVVM architecture and Cubit state management, resulting in a seamless user experience and efficient app functionality
achievements: Successfully implemented 3rd party library Banuba Camera SDK to Flutter Android and iOS using Method Channel
Implemented unit test and some debugging tool like Firebase Crashlytics to track app performance and bug

experience.title: Mobile Developer Lead
experience.description: Led mobile development team to achieve top 10 ranking in Play Store education platform with 4.9/5.0 rating from 1800+ reviews using Flutter with MVVM architecture and Provider state management.
responsibilities: Led a team in the development of the Zeniora app utilizing Flutter with MVVM software architecture and Provider as state management, resulting in a seamless user experience and efficient codebase maintenance

Led the mobile development team in optimizing the Zeniora Education app to achieve a top 10 ranking in the Play Store's education platform, resulting in a remarkable 4.9/5.0 rating from over 1800 reviews
Implemented Scrum and Agile methodologies within the developer team at Zeniora Education, resulting in improved collaboration, increased productivity, and timely delivery of mobile applications
Integrated Zeniora App with Midtrans Payment Gateway in webview implementation
Implemented advanced CI/CD pipelines for the Zeniora App, automating the building, testing, and deployment processes, leading to accelerated development cycles and improved code quality
achievements: Achieved a top 10 app ranking in the Play Store's education platform in 2019
Got 1800++ positive reviews with 4.9/5.0 rating in Play Store
Successfully led Zeniora Development team from zero

experience.title: iOS Developer Internship
experience.description: Developed award-winning iOS applications including WWDC 2021 Swift Student Challenge winner, focusing on Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and Apple ecosystem integration.
responsibilities: Developed an interactive and educational COVID-19 game using Swift Playground, recognized with the prestigious WWDC 2021 award from Apple Inc for innovation and creativity

Created a portfolio of iOS applications at the Apple Developer Academy using Swift, UIKit, and SwiftUI, applying MVVM and VIPER architecture patterns to deliver intuitive user interfaces and robust functionality
Designed and implemented real-time heart rate monitoring functionality for the emergency safety app on iOS and watchOS, utilizing Swift to ensure seamless integration with Apple devices
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team at the Apple Developer Academy | UC to design and develop a cutting-edge iOS application that showcased innovative features and seamless user experience
achievements: Awardee WWDC21 Swift Student Challenge Award

experience.title: Laboratory Research Assistant
experience.description: Led multidisciplinary teams in developing groundbreaking multimedia applications and provided Flutter mentorship while managing laboratory operations and conducting programming workshops.
responsibilities: Led a multidisciplinary team in the design and development of a groundbreaking multimedia application that revolutionized data visualization in telematics research at B201 Telematics Laboratory

Assisted in conducting research on cutting-edge multimedia technologies at the B201 Telematics Laboratory, leading to the development of innovative applications that pushed the boundaries of the field
Provided personalized Flutter mentorship to students at B201 Telematics Laboratory, guiding them in developing innovative mobile applications and honing their programming skills

Developed and implemented a comprehensive laboratory practicum program for new students in the Electrical Technology Faculty, improving hands-on learning experiences and knowledge retention. Led and supervised assistants in effectively managing laboratory tests and ensuring seamless operations at the B201 Telematics Laboratory

Assisted in conducting interactive C++ programming workshops for students at Sekolah Tinggi Teknologi Angkatan Laut (STTAL), enhancing their foundational skills and understanding of programming concepts
achievements: Led programming laboratory for Electrical faculty students
Initiated mobile programming group for Computer Engineering students

projects.title: Engelhorn Stationary - Wolkk
projects.description: A Point-of-Sale (POS) application developed for internal use at Engelhorn retail. Built on the Windows platform with Flutter.
projects.detailedDescription: A Point-of-Sale (POS) application developed for internal use at Engelhorn retail. Built on the Windows platform, it includes features such as transactions, purchase journals, stock management, customer display on a secondary screen, and support for multiple payment methods. The app is developed using Flutter for Windows with BLoC Cubit as state management. We applied Clean Architecture, Unit Testing, Widget Testing, CI/CD, Build Runner, and Code Coverage. It also integrates real-time communication via WebSocket.

challenges.solution: Implemented Flutter for Windows with custom platform channels to integrate native Windows functionality and keyboard behavior.
Developed custom solution for customer display on secondary screen with real-time synchronization.

projects.title: EEA Pad - Wolkk
projects.description: A self-checkout food and beverage ordering application with accessibility support for users with disabilities.
projects.detailedDescription: A self-checkout food and beverage ordering application. Its key features include accessibility support such as voice guidance and visual markers to aid users with disabilities. The app is built using Flutter for Windows with BLoC Cubit as state management. During development, we implemented Clean Architecture, Build Runner, and CI/CD.

challenges.solution: Integrated comprehensive accessibility features including voice guidance and visual markers to ensure usability for users with disabilities.

projects.title: Anker Store App - Wolkk
projects.description: A cross-business Point-of-Sale (POS) application built on the Windows platform with comprehensive business features.
projects.detailedDescription: A cross-business Point-of-Sale (POS) application built on the Windows platform. It features transaction processing, purchase journals, stock management, customer display with a secondary screen, and multiple payment methods. Developed using Flutter for Windows with BLoC Cubit, the app follows Clean Architecture and includes Unit Testing, Widget Testing, Build Runner, CI/CD, and Code Coverage. WebSocket is implemented for real-time communication.

projects.title: Engelhorn API Package - Wolkk
projects.description: A shared library designed to handle API consumption in the Engelhorn POS project for standardized networking.
projects.detailedDescription: A shared library designed to handle API consumption in the Engelhorn POS project. It was built to standardize the networking flow between mobile and desktop projects. With this package, developers can simply invoke predefined actions directly, improving consistency and maintainability across platforms.

projects.title: Grab & Go - Wolkk
projects.description: A web-based application for visitor counting and tracking within retail stores using Flutter Web.
projects.detailedDescription: A web-based application developed using Flutter Web. It is used for visitor counting and tracking within a retail store. The development uses BLoC Cubit for state management and implements Clean Architecture, Unit Testing, Widget Testing, Build Runner, CI/CD, and Code Coverage.

projects.title: CUiT – Volantis.io
projects.description: A social media application connecting influencers with clients for collaboration opportunities.
projects.detailedDescription: A social media application to connect influencers with clients who want to collaborate. This application is made using Flutter with BLoC Cubit as state management. My job desk in this app is implement Method Channel from banuba SDK native to Flutter, build chat feature, integrate connect social media and build quest campaign feature to earn money.
features: Method Channel integration with Banuba SDK

challenges.solution: Successfully implemented Method Channel to integrate Banuba Camera SDK from native Kotlin and Swift to Flutter.
Achieved 35% performance improvement through advanced Flutter packages and MVVM architecture with Cubit state management.

projects.title: BuzzCo – Volantis.io
projects.description: An internal community application for companies to encourage engagement between employees and external parties.
projects.detailedDescription: Buzzco is an application designed and developed for companies that want an internal community to be formed within the company. With this application, it is expected to encourage engagement between employees, companies, and external parties. In this app, I contributed to developing some features like gamification and user authentication.

projects.title: Zeniora Education - Zeniora
projects.description: An educational application helping students progress to higher education levels with practice questions and university comparisons.
projects.detailedDescription: Zeniora, one of the startups in the education sector in Surabaya Within a few weeks, the app received 1800 ++ reviews with an average of 5 stars. Zeniora is an application that helps students in progressing to a higher level such as going to college. In the Zeniora application, there are several features such as practice questions, university comparisons, and the upcoming feature is the psychologist test. In making this application, I use Flutter with Provider as state management. For the payment system, the Zeniora application uses Midtrans as a payment gateway.

challenges.solution: Implemented efficient state management with Provider and optimized Firebase usage to handle 1800+ active users.

projects.title: Gaidz (Travel) - Freelance
projects.description: A village tourism application highlighting local potential and facilitating trip planning to Indonesian tourist villages.
projects.detailedDescription: Gaidz is a village tourism application designed to highlight local potential and make it easier for travelers to plan trips to tourist villages in Indonesia. Gaidz is built as an integrated platform that allows users to book accommodations, register for local events, hire tour guides, and purchase local MSME products directly through the app. We use the Flutter framework with Provider state management and Clean Architecture in 1 months

projects.title: Sasa Melezatkan (E-commerce) - Freelance
projects.description: An e-commerce application for Sasa Inti Company featuring Google Maps integration and Xendit payment gateway.
projects.detailedDescription: Sasa Melezatkan is an e-commerce application from Sasa Inti Company to serve their product transactions to the public. In this project, I developed with 1 person in this team. We use the Flutter framework with GetX state management and Clean Architecture in 2 months. Inside the app, we include Google maps and Xendit payment gateway.

projects.title: DSA Unioleo - Freelance
projects.description: A safety audit application for Unioleo Unilever employees to report and collect safety equipment checks.
projects.detailedDescription: DSA Unioleo is an app for the Safety team in Unioleo Unilever. Users can audit, add a report, and update information in every area. This app use for Unioleo employee report and collect safety equipment check.

projects.title: CPM Unioleo - Freelance
projects.description: An internal application for Unilever Unioleo employees for tracking and reporting chemical processing equipment.
projects.detailedDescription: CPM Unioleo is an internal application used by Unilever Unioleo employees for tracking and reporting chemical processing equipment. Key features include schedule uploads via Excel, audit and monitoring of equipment data, PDF report exports, and digital signatures. The application is available on both web and mobile platforms. The web version is developed with React.js (frontend) and Node.js (backend), while the mobile version is built using Flutter with Cubit for state management.

projects.title: MPACT - Freelance
projects.description: An iOS application for internal company management and reporting of incoming and outgoing goods supply.
projects.detailedDescription: MPACT is an iOS application for internal companies for management and reports of incoming and outgoing goods supply from the company. This app is built using iOS native Swift with MaterialUI

projects.title: As Swift As Possible (ASAP) – Apple Developer Academy
projects.description: A native iOS app helping people learn Swift consistently through gamification and forum discussions.
projects.detailedDescription: A native iOS app that helps people learn Swift consistently for new Swift Learner by applying gamification and forum discussion for daily learning goals in the form of challenging but achievable tasks. This is a solution to the challenge because we found that many people want to learn swift programming language but lake of the fun platform that can maintain their interest to learn consistently and lake of forum discussion to boost their motivation while learning with others. In development, I use Swift to build this app with MVVM architecture and UIKit as a frontend.

projects.title: Prediksri – Apple Developer Academy
projects.description: A native iOS app for restaurants to manage inventory through recipe-based forecasting notifications.
projects.detailedDescription: A native iOS Apps for restaurant that helps them to manage their inventory by notifying them to restock using recipe-base forecast. In development, I use Swift to build this app with MVVM architecture and UIKit as a frontend and deploy to TestFlight for internal testing.

projects.title: Keneiso – Apple Developer Academy
projects.description: An iOS app helping users make direct donations by finding nearby people in need using map features.
projects.detailedDescription: Keneiso is an app that helps someone make a direct donation by finding nearby people in need. Keneiso provide a map feature for the user to find someone in need with specific radius. In development, I use Swift to build this app with VIPER architecture and SwiftUI as a frontend.

projects.title: Safetant – Apple Developer Academy
projects.description: A native iOS and watchOS app for drivers to stay awake while driving with emergency broadcasting features.
projects.detailedDescription: A native iOS and watchOS App for driver to stay awake while driving and get help in case of emergency by monitoring the heart rate change while driving and broadcasting emergency when fall was detected. In development, I use Swift to build this app with MVVM architecture and UIKit as a frontend. For watch app, we use WatchKit and HealthKit.

projects.title: Vood – Apple Developer Academy
projects.description: A native iOS app helping young adults find suitable restaurants based on their activity needs.
projects.detailedDescription: A native iOS app that helps to find suitable restaurants for young adults who are looking for restaurants that are suitable for their activity by providing recommendations based on their needs. This is a solution to the challenge because they have to put a lot of effort into browsing through different platforms for the information needed. In development, I use Swift to build this app with MVVM architecture and UIKit as a frontend.

projects.title: RailMo Track - B201 Telematics Laboratory
projects.description: A real-time application connected to sensors for detecting train vibrations with Google Maps integration.
projects.detailedDescription: Railmo Track is an real-time application that is connected to sensors to detect the vibration of the train when it is running. In development, I use Android Native with Java and implement Google Maps inside the app.

projects.title: Foculance - B201 Telematics Laboratory
projects.description: A child monitoring application limiting smartphone and tablet usage with educational timer features.
projects.detailedDescription: Foculance is a child monitoring application which can limit the use of smartphones and tablets using a timer. The timer can increase if the child answers questions about school lessons. Development of foculance using android native and hybrid with flutter framework. In Foculance development, I am the originator of ideas, designing, designing poster, and developing mobile applications. Currently, Foculance is still under construction to version 2.0. Foculance build with Android Native and Flutter framework.

projects.title: AI Helmet Detector - B201 Telematics Laboratory
projects.description: A final project using computer vision and AI to detect traffic violations related to helmet usage in Indonesia.
projects.detailedDescription: A final project developed to fulfill the graduation requirements for a bachelor's degree in engineering at ITS. This project combines computer vision and AI to detect traffic violations related to not wearing helmets in Indonesia. The dataset used was sourced from CCTV footage provided by the Surabaya Department of Transportation. YOLO v3 and YOLO v3 Lite were implemented to compare performance and accuracy between models.

projects.title: Siklame - B201 Telematics Laboratory
projects.description: An e-government application for tax data collection on billboards replacing paper-based conventional methods.
projects.detailedDescription: An e-government application for tax data collection on billboards to replace paper-based conventional method. In developing applications, we use native Android with Java and websites. In making this application, I am developing a mobile app used by surveyors and designing poster.

projects.title: Bualoka - B201 Telematics Laboratory
projects.description: A fruit trading application utilizing IoT and image processing for detecting fruit quality.
projects.detailedDescription: Bualoka is a fruit trading transaction application that utilizes IoT and image processing in detecting fruit quality. The seller can ensure the fruit is sold by detecting the level of ethylene gas using sensors and the color of the fruit using computer vision through a mobile application. During the development process, I developed a mobile app with Android native java that utilizes computer vision with classification methods and connects with sensors.

projects.title: Smart Room Security - B201 Telematics Laboratory
projects.description: An IoT and Computer Vision project for room security with face recognition and mobile notifications.
projects.detailedDescription: Smart Room Security is an Internet of Things and Computer Vision mini project. This application is used to display the history of people standing in front of the camera that has been installed on the door and provide notifications if there are people at the door. The application receives data from image processing results obtained by the camera and is processed using Artificial Intelligence to recognize faces. If the face is detected as the owner, the door will open, if the face is not recognized, it will send a notification to the mobile application. In development, I use the Flutter framework and integrate Firebase Authentication into the Login app.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Always exploring new technologies and approaches to solve problems creatively.

values.title: Quality
values.description: Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and delivering polished products.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: Believing that the best solutions come from working together and sharing knowledge.
